email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

We are looking to ship 75,000 MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Could you provide us with a freight rate and vessel availability for this shipment? We are aiming for a laycan of November 15-20, 2023.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE, DWT 82,000, LOA 225m, for your shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 25/MT on CIF terms. The laycan is November 15-20, 2023, as requested. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 25/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider a rate of USD 22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Given the current market, we can adjust the rate to USD 23/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 72 hours. Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

USD 23/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for MV OCEAN BREEZE with the laycan of November 15-20, 2023. Kindly send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let us know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Emily Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
John Doe
